#summary How to Use JUGen Template

= Introduction =

JUGen template is based on [http://groovy.codehaus.org/Groovy+Templates Groovy Templates]. 



= Details =

The JUGen template has an implicit object, called *javaObjectInfo*. *javaObjectInfo* has the following properties:
  * packageName
  * className
  * testClassName
  * publicMethods (List)
  * publicTestMethods (List)
